about_the_game:
NOA’s PROJECT is a voxel rogue-lite stylish action game.
Secret agent NOA fights against various types of enemies using katana and submachine gun.

NOA challenges random generated dungeons to complete her secret missions.

Collect Skill Items to power up NOA and defeat the bosses that awaits her in the dungeon.
Permanent upgrades are also available by spending the Cores you collect on your way.

There's a wide variety of dress-up skins that comes with special ability too!
Complete the missions with your favorite skins and abilities!!
